changeSet.author: paulsc
changeSet.comment: Deletes all data needed to do a clean install

changeSet.author: paulsc
changeSet.sql: alter table clinlims.panel_item alter column test_id set not null

changeSet.author: paulsc
changeSet.comment: Associates new and existing sample types with new and existing panels

changeSet.author: paulsc
changeSet.comment: Adds dictionary result limits to tests

changeSet.author: paulsc
changeSet.comment: Deactivate the Free Text test section

changeSet.author: paulsc
changeSet.comment: Update the system module to mycobacteriologie from mycobology

update.where: system_module_id = ( select id from clinlims.system_module where name = 'ResultValidation:mycology' )

changeSet.author: paulsc
changeSet.sql: update clinlims.test_result set tst_rslt_type = 'M' where test_id in ( select id from clinlims.test where name in ('Rougeole','Dengue','Rubeole','Syphilis RPR','VIH-1 PCR Qualitatif','Recherche de Virus Respiratoire Influenza', 'Germes Enterogastriques pathog√®nes','Virus Respiratoire','Micobacterium tuberculosis Drug Resistant','Ziehl Neelsen modifiee', 'Malaria','Recherche de Microfilaires'));

changeSet.author: paulsc
changeSet.comment: Result limits for CD4 abs were missed

changeSet.author: paulsc
changeSet.comment: Update viral load to add quanitive qualification

changeSet.author: paulsc
changeSet.sql: Update test SET description='CD4 Compte Absolu(Sang Total)', reporting_description='CD4 Compte Absolu', local_abbrev='CD4 Compte Absolu', name='CD4 Compte Absolu', lastupdated=now() WHERE description = 'CD4 Compte Abs(Sang Total)';

changeSet.author: paulsc
changeSet.comment: Update the result limits for Neutrophiles and Lymphocytes

update.where: test_id = (select id from clinlims.test where name = 'Neutrophiles')
test_id = (select id from clinlims.test where name = 'Lymphocytes')

changeSet.author: paulsc
changeSet.comment: Makes all the antiboiotics un orderable
